name: Vans Old Skool Black White

details.description:
If you are looking for a staple pair of black and white Vans for your rotation, the Vans Old Skool Black White is a popular choice. It arrives with a low-top black canvas upper with white leather Vans stripe detailing on lateral and medial sides. At the base, a white and gum waffle cup sole with a red, branded heel patch adds the finishing touch.

This model of the Vans Old Skool Black White released in 2017 and retailed for $70.

name: Vans Old Skool Triple Black

details.description: The Vans Old Skool Triple Black is a classic sneaker that has been updated with a sleek and modern design. The shoe features a black canvas upper with black suede overlays, giving it a monochromatic look that is both stylish and versatile. The iconic Vans side stripe is also black, adding to the shoe's understated aesthetic. Released on January 1st, 2019, the Vans Old Skool Triple Black is a must-have for any sneakerhead looking for a timeless and versatile shoe. The retail price of $70 makes it an affordable option for those looking to add a classic sneaker to their collection. The shoe is made with high-quality materials, including a durable canvas upper and a rubber sole that provides excellent traction and support. The cushioned footbed ensures all-day comfort, making it perfect for everyday wear. Something we love about the Vans Old Skool Triple Black is its ability to complement any outfit, from casual to dressy. Our experts think the best features of the shoe are its sleek design, durable materials, and comfortable fit. The standout feature of the Vans Old Skool Triple Black is its monochromatic colorway, which gives it a modern and sophisticated look. Our experts especially love how versatile the shoe is, making it a great addition to any sneaker collection.

name: Vans Old Skool 36+ Carpet Company Mustard

details.description: The Vans Old Skool 36+ Carpet Company Mustard is a striking collaboration that brings a fresh twist to the classic skate shoe. This unique iteration features a vibrant mustard yellow colorway that immediately catches the eye, while the signature side stripe and iconic waffle outsole maintain the timeless Vans aesthetic. The upper is crafted with a combination of premium suede and canvas, offering both style and durability for everyday wear. Designed in partnership with Carpet Company, a Baltimore-based skateboard brand known for their creative graphics and DIY ethos, this Old Skool 36+ model showcases subtle yet distinctive details. The shoe incorporates custom branding elements and potentially hidden designs that skateboard enthusiasts and sneaker collectors will appreciate. With its padded collar and reinforced toe cap, this sneaker provides the comfort and support that Vans is renowned for, making it suitable for both skating and casual street style. Our team thinks this product is great for those seeking a unique, eye-catching sneaker that combines skate functionality with streetwear appeal.

name: Vans OG Old Skool LX Gallery Dept. Good Luck

details.description: The Vans Old Skool Gallery Dept Good Luck is a limited edition sneaker that combines the classic Old Skool silhouette with unique design elements from the Gallery Dept brand. The upper is made of premium suede and canvas materials in a bold black and white colorway, with Gallery Dept's signature paint splatter detailing throughout. The shoe also features a custom Good Luck embroidery on the heel and a Gallery Dept logo on the tongue. Released on May 19th, 2023, the Vans Old Skool Gallery Dept Good Luck retails for $150. This shoe is a must-have for fans of both Vans and Gallery Dept, as it seamlessly blends the two brands' aesthetics into one eye-catching design. Something we love about Vans Old Skool Gallery Dept Good Luck is the attention to detail in the design, from the paint splatter to the custom embroidery. Our experts think the standout feature of the Vans Old Skool Gallery Dept Good Luck is the unique collaboration between two iconic brands. This shoe is a true collector's item and a statement piece for any sneakerhead's collection.

name: Vans Old Skool Comfy Cush Black White

details.description:
The Vans Old Skool Comfy Cush Black White is a low top canvas and suede sneaker featuring a Black upper, accented by the signature Vans Sidestripe in White. White stitching and White laces further contrast the Black upper. The White sole is outlined in Black, and a red Vans Off the Wall logo tab adorns the rear heel.

American skateboarding shoe and lifestyle brand Vans began in 1966, and they have been known for their sponsorship of skate, surfing, and BMX events, as well as their involvement in cultural phenomena like the 90s Warped Tour. With the Old Skool Comfy Cush, Vans retains the iconic styling of the Old Skool silhouette, while improving its comfort with cloud-like cushioning.

In our opinion, the best feature of the Old Skool Comfy Cush is its Black and White color story, which adheres to the classic Vans aesthetic. The Vans Old Skool Comfy Cush Black White retailed at $65 upon release.

Vans Old Skool LX Yusuke Hanai Black
Vans Old Skool 36 LX Mismatched Color Block
Vans OTW Old Skool 36 Engineered Knit Potting Soil Brown
Vans Skate Old Skool Black White
Vans Old Skool 36 FM Black
Vans Old Skool Patchwork Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon
Vans Old Skool Navy True White (PS)
Vans Old Skool Platform Pride (2021)
Vans LX Old Skool Bape ABC Multi-Camo

details.description:
The Vans LX Old Skool Bape ABC Multi-Camo gives the classic Vans Old Skool design a camouflage upgrade with mismatched colors on each shoe. This skateboarding sneaker is part of a collaboration between Vans and Bape – A Bathing Ape, a Japanese streetwear label.

The Bape ABC Multi-Camo Vans LX Old Skool’s minimalist build serves as the perfect canvas to display the bold camo print favored by Bape. The left shoe covers the camo print’s asymmetrical shapes in traditional green on the lateral side and in shades of blue on the medial side. In comparison, the right shoe displays green camo on the medial side and pink on the lateral side panel. Bape’s signature star logo shoots across the side panels and comes in a neutral white.

Our experts at StockX like the midsole, which features a shark tooth design at the front of the shoe. The Vans LX Old Skool Bape ABC Multi-Camo was released on July 27, 2024, and sold for $109.

name: Vans OTW Old Skool 36 Pearlized Pack Black

details.description:
The Vans OTW Old Skool 36 Pearlized Pack Black debuted as part of the pearlized pack, which released two colorways featuring pearl detailing on Old Skool 36 Vans sneakers.

This version is the sleek, distressed-style black colorway. Oozing a vintage vibe with strategically placed jewels all around, including on the Sidestripe, this chunky shoe will pair well with baggy pants or boxy cargos. The upper is made out of black suede and canvas and sits upon a height-adding rubber outsole/midsole that presents in a pre-scuffed style. "Off the Wall" branding is at the heel bottom and distressed laces complete the look.

We think that embellishing the Sidestripe, which originally appeared on the Style 36 model, with pearls and gemstones is a unique way to alter a piece of the brand’s iconic image. When the Vans OTW Old Skool 36 Pearlized Pack Black was made available to the public on September 1, 2024, it retailed for $130.

name: Vans OTW Old Skool 36 Pearlized Pack Marshmallow White

details.description:
The Vans OTW Old Skool 36 Pearlized Pack Marshmallow White is a low-top sneaker featuring a Marshmallow White canvas and black faux suede upper. The white Vans SideStripe is accented by faux pearls and silver tone rhinestones, which also accent the vamp, heel, and tongue. The white rubber sole unit is distressed and outlined in blue, and the Vans skateboard logo branding appears at the rear heel.

American sneaker and lifestyle brand Vans has a history that dates to 1966, and they have long been associated with sports like skateboarding and BMX. The Old Skool is a signature style that Vans has produced since 1977, and the Old Skool 36 reimagines the style with jeweled ornamentation that is toned down by distressing techniques on the sole.

Our experts feel that the best feature of the Old Skool 36 is its high-low aesthetic, which gives a DIY feel. The Vans OTW Old Skool 36 Pearlized Pack Marshmallow White was released on September 1, 2024, and retailed at $130.

name: Vans Old Skool Navy White

details.description:
The Vans Old Skool sneaker is one of the shoes that helped put Vans on the map back in the 1970s. To celebrate this, Vans has continuously released new Old Skool colorways over the years, including the Vans Old Skool Navy White.

Like other Vans Old Skool options, this one featured a low-top design and an upper that had a mixture of suede and canvas. It also included a blend of navy blue and black along with Vans' iconic white Sidestripe. Additionally, it had everything from reinforced toe caps and padded collars to a lace-up closure and Vans' patented rubber waffle outsoles.

All of this kept this Vans Old Skool looking similar to many of the Old Skools that came before it, but that became what we loved about it so much. It stayed true to the original Vans vision by paying tribute to what has worked for the Old Skool for so many years now. The Vans Old Skool Navy White was released on January 1, 2000, and retailed for $70.
